top_comments.comment: Want THREE (3) Masters booster boxes (2015, 2017, and Ultimate)? It's the Triple Masters giveaway! Just donate in multiples of $4.00 to Trans Lifeline below and I will send one donor ALL THREE boxes on Oct 30 at 6pm PST! I'll mail worldwide! But there's also 45 additional MTG prizes going out to 45 additional donors! You can see the full list here: https://twitter.com/TolarianCollege/status/1454226004130426884?s=20 and you just need to donate in $4 multiples. Each $4 is another chance to get a cool prize! Donate---> https://secure.givelively.org/donate/trans-lifeline/tolarian-community-college-1

comments_since_last_sample.body: I’m over here wondering what kicker even is.
He’s outa line, but he’s right.
Idea: What if kicker, but harder to translate?
And what about Mentor and Training?
I personally got a kicker out of this one.

You forgot Defender.
Everything in Magic is either Kicker, Horsemanship, or Defender.
Thank you Prof cause I also got Exploit and Extort mixed up
I feel like this was an actual conversation that took place while playing and not a bit. Lol.
I guess Trample is like flying because some of the damage goes to the opponent.
I'm kinda shocked that banding wasn't mentioned. Does banding fall under Kicker or Horsemanship?
This make my life , a huge shake and i wont se magic in the same way, ever, im sad, but some how, catartic.  what a video, ty.
I have no idea who thought about this, but this is genius on so many level
Wait.... Buyback existed before kicker was introduced... So it's a delayed kicker
Don't mind me, just paying a kicker cost to engage the algorithm.

Thank you Prof for the Shudder promo code! My wife and I will definitely get some use out of this, but the extra 3+ week free trial was a pretty cool thing regardless if you like horror/thrillers or not.
